item.description:
GREENLAND Rolling and Bracing Clinic 
Demonstration and instruction by Fred Randall, Wayne & Nancy Hill
Assisted by Leslie Beale & Doug Mogill

(Cost of entrance to the pool session "only" $25)

This is an NSPN event. I am offering it to 3 members of Northeast Seacoast Paddlers in an effort to bridge the transition of those interested in moving into the Greenland Paddling experience. Traditional advanced beginner to intermediate kayak skills are are requested for this venue. Please contact me by personal message if you are interested.

"For those of you attending, please IM your height and weight to me so we can can have a Greenland boat for you to try. You are also requested to bring your own boat but Greenland Paddles only please. We will provide a greenland paddle for those of you that do not own one." Doug

Memo from Nancy Hill:
"I will be able to join Wayne and Fred to help with the Greenland Clinic on April 1. Wayne, Fred and I can bring a few extra low volume kayaks and gear for people to use. For anyone wanting to use one of our kayaks it would be good to know their height and weight so we can bring appropriate kayaks and gear. If you can gather that information and give it to us a few days before the session, it would be very helpful. I realize that most people do want to learn to roll their own kayaks, but it is often easier for someone to get a feel for the body mechanics in a lower volume kayak before transferring skills to their own kayak. People who want to use one of our kayaks should still bring their own in case there is an unexpected fit issue."
-Nancy

Note from Fred Randall
"This is a rolling clinic, using traditional "Greenland" rolling methods. The Greenland methods simplify rolling a kayak. I have seen experienced paddlers who roll mostly one one side, fearfully on the other,and uncertain in really rough conditions. They have been amazed how easy it is to make that roll effortless on either side and have gone on quickly to roll up on all 4 quadrants ( forward finishing and back finishing both sides). This is not so much about tradition rolling or "Greenland" rolling as simple,bombproof rolling or maybe argumentatively "rolling done correctly".

COST: $25
Make check payable to NSPN
put "Greenland Clinic" in the memo area of your check.

 

ADVANCED PAYMENT REQUIRED

Mail payment to:
Doug Mogill
P.O Box 341
Derry, NH 03038

APRIL 1st 3-6pm
item.name: GREENLAND Rolling and Bracing Clinic "Advanced Beginner to Intermediate Level"
